ygData.subject: Re: Tome of Magi Lor WEB PAGE...
ygData.msgSnippet: Sounds like a cool idea I would definitely add your site to my list of sites I visit each day.  I would highly recommend that you keep the site secure and only
ygData.messageBody:
Sounds like a cool idea I would definitely add your site to my list of sites
I visit each day. I would highly recommend that you keep the site secure
and only allow those to make submissions who have proved themselves to be
trustworthy. Also, there needs to be a way for us to correct incorrect
submissions if we find out new information. I don't know of the tools to
automate all this, but I am sure they are out there.

-Solric of the 4th circle


-----Original Message-----
From: Elkantar The Wizard [mailto:the_elkantar@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 10:38 AM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] Tome of Magi Lor WEB PAGE...


From: "Elkantar The Wizard" <the_elkantar@...>

I wish to create a "Tome of Magi Lor" web page. If you have or know where I
can get a CGI/HTML script that will allow others to add their comments to
this web page please let me know. What I am looking for is a CGI data base
that allows external entries to be added then automatically updates a FAQ
sheet. The automatic part is a must cause I like to play EQ too much to get
stuck updating a web page. I can screen the page and omit others. I would
really like a CIG data base that would allow me to have a login and password

security that way those pesky fighters could not steal information. Also I
would be able to track who said what about quests or items to glean more
info from then if needed.


Elkantar Keeper of the Tome of Magi Lore
